name: places/ChIJV_ETFcBZwokRkglLeC8y8tg
formattedAddress: 831 Washington St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 831 Washington St, New York, NY 10014, USA

editorialSummary.text: Store for the French-based fashion label with chic, edgy clothing & accessories for men & women.

originalText.text: Very bad customer service. I went there to pick up my order. One of the workers was on her sell phone, talking during her work. She didn’t even sow me walking in. I went straight to the cashier guy, who didn’t mention me as well. That’s the hospitality in this location. I appeared very calm and tolerant. It was interesting to watch them doing their job so bad. When customers finally left workers asked me who was I. They thought I was with those guys. “Oh u should tell us” told me that girl. NO! EXCUSE ME THAT’S YOU WHO SHOULD DO UR WORK BETTER!!!  Customer service in Soho is way better. Even thought they have a lot of customers they don’t ignore you. But in this location they had only one group of customers and they still worked as slow as snails. Don’t shop in this location.

originalText.text: With all honesty why are shirts made in India with their logo ranging from $75-$125? The t-shirts are totally out of shape. The sleeves are too long, the buttons don't lie against the button holes. They are soft but I wouldn't waste money for the merchandise. The staff speaks French and who knows if they talk about you? I found that a problem. I wanted to purchase boots and felt the cashier doubted I could afford them. What ever---to snotty for me. Good luck Zadig!

originalText.text: I think their vibe is cool, but mostly it's about accessories here.  I used to like the meatpacking district.  Now I find the area over run with Jersey girls and tourists lost and bewildered or coming from the highline.  I love their bags, sales people are cool.  Most of their stuff is great, it's expensive, but hey it's a boutique, and it should be.  The coats are usually cool as well. I think I have two of them.  Nice store.

originalText.text: A great location for a great brand. The service was impeccable and personalized. I forgot my scarf inside and realized much much later. Thankfully, Miles found it and put it aside for me.

text.text: A great location for a great brand. The service was impeccable and personalized. I forgot my scarf inside and realized much much later. Thankfully, Miles found it and put it aside for me.

originalText.text:
I've had great experiences with the staff every time I've gone in!
Really sweet and helpful - they went above and beyond.
